News.Title: Rajshree Polypack Expands Extrusion Machinery Capacity by 1,600 MTPA
News.Summary: Rajshree Polypack has added 1,600 MTPA capacity for extrusion machinery operations. The expansion brings the company's total capacity to 25,600 MTPA, representing a capacity enhancement for the polypack manufacturer.

News.Title: Rajshree PolyPack Expands Injection Molded Food Packaging Capacity
News.Summary: Rajshree PolyPack has increased its injection molded food packaging capacity by 900 MTPA (Metric Tonnes Per Annum). This expansion brings the company's total capacity to 4,200 MTPA.

News.Title: Rajshree Polypack Signs 90-Year Lease for New Manufacturing Unit in Odisha
News.Summary: Rajshree Polypack has entered into a 90-year lease agreement with IDCO (Industrial Development Corporation of Odisha) to set up a new manufacturing unit in Odisha. This move indicates the company's plans for expansion and long-term investment in the state.

News.Title: Rajshree Polypack Secures 90-Year Lease for New Manufacturing Facility in Odisha
News.Summary: Rajshree Polypack has entered into a 90-year lease agreement with IDCO (Industrial Development Corporation of Odisha) for a new manufacturing facility in Odisha. The company plans to establish this facility, indicating an expansion of its operations into the state.

News.Title: Rajshree Polypack Secures Export Orders Worth ₹9.14 Crore from U.S. Distributors
News.Summary: Rajshree Polypack has obtained export orders valued at ₹9.14 crore from distributors based in the United States. This development indicates the company's expansion into international markets and potential growth in its export business.
